channel.title: Posts on Darius's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Darius's Blog

item.title: The LSA Gloves project
item.description: In the last post I said the project with which we got our engineering degree deserved its own post. Indeed, I’m going to explain a little what was this project which consisted of a glove with sensors and embedded machine learning connected to a Flutter mobile app that translates gestures of the Argentinian sign language.

item.title: I got my software engineering degree!
item.description: I graduated! I am officially a software engineer from the none other than the great University of Buenos Aires!

item.title: Welcome to my page!
item.description: Finally, I’ve got my own page! Here I’m going to write down about my professional experiences, my technical interests and other topics.
